# This file was generated by _generate_ea_resolutions.py


### Resolution: trade

# Effect when resolution trade is passed
ea_resolution_trade_effect = {

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_1 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_1 add_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_2 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_2 add_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_3 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_3 add_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_4 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_4 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_4 add_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_5 }
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_trade_idea_1
	}
}

# Tooltip of the currently active trade resolution
ea_resolution_trade_current_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_current_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_trade_idea_1
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_trade_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_trade_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_4 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_trade_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_none_tt
	}
}

# Tooltip of the next tier trade resolution
ea_resolution_trade_next_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_next_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_trade_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_trade_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_trade_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_trade_idea_1
	}
}

# Adds the current trade resolution to a country
ea_resolution_trade_add_to_new_member = {

	any_country = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = is_elven_trade_member }

		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_1 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_trade_idea_1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_2 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_trade_idea_2 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_3 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_trade_idea_3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_4 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_trade_idea_4 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_trade_idea_5 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_trade_idea_5 }
		}
	}
}




### Resolution: union

# Effect when resolution union is passed
ea_resolution_union_effect = {

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_1 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_1 add_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_2 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_2 add_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_3 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_3 add_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_4 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_4 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_4 add_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_5 }
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_union_idea_1
	}
}

# Tooltip of the currently active union resolution
ea_resolution_union_current_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_current_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_union_idea_1
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_union_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_union_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_4 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_union_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_none_tt
	}
}

# Tooltip of the next tier union resolution
ea_resolution_union_next_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_next_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_union_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_union_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_union_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_union_idea_1
	}
}

# Adds the current union resolution to a country
ea_resolution_union_add_to_new_member = {

	any_country = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = is_elven_union_member }

		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_1 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_union_idea_1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_2 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_union_idea_2 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_3 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_union_idea_3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_4 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_union_idea_4 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_union_idea_5 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_union_idea_5 }
		}
	}
}




### Resolution: research

# Effect when resolution research is passed
ea_resolution_research_effect = {

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_1 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_1 add_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_2 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_2 add_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_3 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_3 add_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_4 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_4 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_4 add_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_5 }
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_research_idea_1
	}
}

# Tooltip of the currently active research resolution
ea_resolution_research_current_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_current_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_research_idea_1
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_research_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_research_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_4 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_research_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_none_tt
	}
}

# Tooltip of the next tier research resolution
ea_resolution_research_next_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_next_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_research_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_research_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_research_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_research_idea_1
	}
}

# Adds the current research resolution to a country
ea_resolution_research_add_to_new_member = {

	any_country = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = is_elven_research_member }

		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_1 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_research_idea_1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_2 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_research_idea_2 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_3 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_research_idea_3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_4 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_research_idea_4 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_research_idea_5 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_research_idea_5 }
		}
	}
}




### Resolution: industry

# Effect when resolution industry is passed
ea_resolution_industry_effect = {

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_1 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_1 add_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_2 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_2 add_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_3 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_3 add_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_4 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_4 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_4 add_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_5 }
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_industry_idea_1
	}
}

# Tooltip of the currently active industry resolution
ea_resolution_industry_current_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_current_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_industry_idea_1
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_industry_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_industry_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_4 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_industry_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_none_tt
	}
}

# Tooltip of the next tier industry resolution
ea_resolution_industry_next_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_next_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_industry_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_industry_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_industry_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_industry_idea_1
	}
}

# Adds the current industry resolution to a country
ea_resolution_industry_add_to_new_member = {

	any_country = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = is_elven_industry_member }

		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_1 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_industry_idea_1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_2 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_industry_idea_2 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_3 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_industry_idea_3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_4 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_industry_idea_4 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_industry_idea_5 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_industry_idea_5 }
		}
	}
}




### Resolution: hegemony

# Effect when resolution hegemony is passed
ea_resolution_hegemony_effect = {

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_1 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_1 add_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_2 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_2 add_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_3 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_3 add_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_4 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_4 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_4 add_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_5 }
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_1
	}
}

# Tooltip of the currently active hegemony resolution
ea_resolution_hegemony_current_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_current_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_1
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_4 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_none_tt
	}
}

# Tooltip of the next tier hegemony resolution
ea_resolution_hegemony_next_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_next_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_1
	}
}

# Adds the current hegemony resolution to a country
ea_resolution_hegemony_add_to_new_member = {

	any_country = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = is_elven_hegemony_member }

		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_1 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_2 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_2 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_3 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_4 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_4 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_5 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_hegemony_idea_5 }
		}
	}
}




### Resolution: expansion

# Effect when resolution expansion is passed
ea_resolution_expansion_effect = {

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_1 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_1 add_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_2 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_2 add_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_3 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_3 add_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_4 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_4 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_4 add_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_5 }
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_1
	}
}

# Tooltip of the currently active expansion resolution
ea_resolution_expansion_current_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_current_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_1
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_4 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_none_tt
	}
}

# Tooltip of the next tier expansion resolution
ea_resolution_expansion_next_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_next_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_1
	}
}

# Adds the current expansion resolution to a country
ea_resolution_expansion_add_to_new_member = {

	any_country = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = is_elven_expansion_member }

		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_1 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_2 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_2 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_3 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_4 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_4 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_5 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_expansion_idea_5 }
		}
	}
}




### Resolution: peace

# Effect when resolution peace is passed
ea_resolution_peace_effect = {

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_1 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_1 add_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_2 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_2 add_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_3 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_3 add_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_4 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_4 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_4 add_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_5 }
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_peace_idea_1
	}
}

# Tooltip of the currently active peace resolution
ea_resolution_peace_current_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_current_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_peace_idea_1
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_peace_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_peace_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_4 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_peace_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_none_tt
	}
}

# Tooltip of the next tier peace resolution
ea_resolution_peace_next_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_next_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_peace_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_peace_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_peace_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_peace_idea_1
	}
}

# Adds the current peace resolution to a country
ea_resolution_peace_add_to_new_member = {

	any_country = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = is_elven_peace_member }

		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_1 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_peace_idea_1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_2 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_peace_idea_2 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_3 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_peace_idea_3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_4 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_peace_idea_4 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_peace_idea_5 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_peace_idea_5 }
		}
	}
}




### Resolution: martial

# Effect when resolution martial is passed
ea_resolution_martial_effect = {

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_1 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_1 add_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_2 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_2 add_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_3 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_3 add_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_4 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_4 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_4 add_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_5 }
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_martial_idea_1
	}
}

# Tooltip of the currently active martial resolution
ea_resolution_martial_current_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_current_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_martial_idea_1
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_martial_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_martial_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_4 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_martial_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_none_tt
	}
}

# Tooltip of the next tier martial resolution
ea_resolution_martial_next_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_next_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_martial_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_martial_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_martial_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_martial_idea_1
	}
}

# Adds the current martial resolution to a country
ea_resolution_martial_add_to_new_member = {

	any_country = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = is_elven_martial_member }

		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_1 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_martial_idea_1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_2 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_martial_idea_2 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_3 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_martial_idea_3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_4 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_martial_idea_4 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_martial_idea_5 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_martial_idea_5 }
		}
	}
}




### Resolution: alliance

# Effect when resolution alliance is passed
ea_resolution_alliance_effect = {

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_1 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_1 add_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_2 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_2 add_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_3 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_3 add_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_4 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_4 }
		swap_ideas = { remove_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_4 add_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_5 }
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_1
	}
}

# Tooltip of the currently active alliance resolution
ea_resolution_alliance_current_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_current_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_1
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_4 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_none_tt
	}
}

# Tooltip of the next tier alliance resolution
ea_resolution_alliance_next_tteffect = {

	custom_effect_tooltip = ea_resolution_next_tt

	if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_1 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_2 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_3
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_3 }
		show_ideas_tooltip = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_4
	}
	else = {
		add_ideas = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_1
	}
}

# Adds the current alliance resolution to a country
ea_resolution_alliance_add_to_new_member = {

	any_country = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = is_elven_alliance_member }

		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_1 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_2 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_2 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_3 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_3 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_4 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_4 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_5 }
			ROOT = { add_ideas = ea_resolution_alliance_idea_5 }
		}
	}
}
